Inventory Service API Documentation

This document provides an overview of the Inventory Service API.

Classes and Methods

AddGood Class

The AddGood class handles adding new goods to the inventory.

DeductGood Class

The DeductGood class handles deducting quantity from the inventory for a specific good.

UpdateGood Class

The UpdateGood class handles updating the details of an existing good.

GetAllGoods Class

The GetAllGoods class handles retrieving all goods in the inventory.
